install.name: Content - Iframe Plugin
install.author: Nguyen Hoang Viet
install.copyright: This extension in released under the GNU/GPL License - http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html
install.description:
mosIframe for Joomla! 1.5. Using: {iframe}your link{/iframe}, or {iframe width="500" hight="400" ...}your link{/iframe}
Other parameters: http://www.w3schools.com/TAGS/tag_iframe.asp

param.name: src
param.label: URL To Show
param.description: Type in the full URL like http://www.abc.com. Or relative url help/help.html

param.name: src_inurl
param.label: Enable URL
param.description: Pass parameters to the iframe URL by adding parameters to the main site URL. src=your_link.

param.name: width
param.label: Frame Width
param.description: Type in the width of your frame in pixels or %.

param.name: height
param.label: Frame Height
param.description: Type in the height of your frame in pixels.

param.name: marginwidth
param.label: Margin Width
param.description: Type in the margin width of your frame in pixels.

param.name: marginheight
param.label: Margin Height
param.description: Type in the margin height of your frame in pixels.

param.name: frameborder
param.label: Frameborder
param.description: Specifies whether or not to display a frame border.

param.name: align
param.label: Align
param.description: Specifies how to align the iframe according to the surrounding text

param.name: name
param.label: Name
param.description: Specifies a unique name of the iframe (to use in scripts).
